title: Full account takeover in ███████ due lack of rate limiting in forgot password
content:
Steps:
Visit the link https://www.██████/██████████and enter the valid ████████.
You will be redirect to the page where it will ask you to fill your ████████ and ████████ that you get in your mail.
Enter the wrong ███ and intercept the request.
Then bruteforce the ███.(You can use burp intruder)
After valid ████████ it will aks you to create new password

Impact
An attacker can takeover victim account if he has valid email related to the victim.
steps: Visit the password reset page and enter a valid email address.
Intercept the request when entering an incorrect verification code.
Bruteforce the verification code using a tool like Burp Intruder.
Once a valid code is found, set a new password for the account.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to perform a full account takeover by exploiting the lack of rate limiting in the forgot password functionality. By intercepting and bruteforcing the verification code, an attacker can reset the password of any account with a known email address.
reason: The attack involves intercepting a request and bruteforcing a verification code, which are straightforward steps. The lack of rate limiting is a common issue, making the discovery process less complex.
